snippet: Residents in Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s hometown of Hailey, Idaho, are trying to make sense of the furious backlash against him and the way the reaction to his release has turned so dark so quickly.
abstract: Residents in Sgt Bowe Bergdahl’s hometown of Hailey, Idaho, are trying to make sense of furious national backlash against the soldier following his release; many in town say they are taken aback by how news reports seem to have instantly made him a lightning rod for all the divisions in American life.
lead_paragraph: Residents in Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s hometown of Hailey, Idaho, are trying to make sense of the furious backlash against him and the way the reaction to his release has turned so dark so quickly.

headline.main: Shaken, G.I.’s Hometown Waits for All the Facts
